Major_Arcs.title: Human Meteor's First Mission: Uncovering the Underwater Threat
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Duke O'Dowd as the Human Meteor and his initial confrontation with an underwater menace linked to a Japanese submarine and suspicious yacht activities.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Initial Investigation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the introduction of the Human Meteor, Duke's taxi driver identity, and the initial hints of an underwater threat, leading into Duke's first transformation and investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi to the Waterfront and Suspicious Followers
The Chase and Human Meteor Transformation
Hospital Visit and Jap Sub Conspiracy
Toby's Plunge and Cry for Help
Divers Spot and Approach Human Meteor

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Conflict and Surface Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the underwater fight between Human Meteor and the divers, the submarine's escape, and the intervention of Namor, culminating in Duke's return to the yacht and discovery of Peter's betrayal.

narrative_arcs.title: Divers Attack Human Meteor with Derogatory Remark
Continuing Underwater Confrontation and Diver's Mishap
Ship Observes Geyser and Prepares to Evade
Duke Escapes and Arrives at the Yacht
Searching for the Depth Map in Peter's Cabin

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Return Home
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the Human Meteor's initial mission, showing the aftermath, Duke's return home, and a sense of closure to the immediate threat.

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazi Saboteurs
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to the Liberty Lads and their fight against Nazi saboteurs, centering around a bus garage conspiracy and a rescue operation.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Liberty Lads and Suspicious Activity
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Liberty Lads in action and sets up a suspicious situation involving an ambulance and an injured man, observed by two boys.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and the Chase
Marine Salutes Civilian - Major Bronson Disguised
Wallet Returned, Boys to See the Boss

sub_scenes.title: Garage Uprising and Marine Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the escalating conflict at the bus garage, the boys' resistance, Bronson's violent intervention, and the arrival of Marines to resolve the situation.

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ in South America: Rescuing Rosita
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows The Champ and Henry in South America as they become entangled in the kidnapping of President's daughter, Rosita, and confront Axis agents and El Tigre.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Initial Confrontation in South America
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces The Champ and Henry in South America and their initial encounter with local authorities who suspect their involvement in Rosita's disappearance.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry's Mission
Discovery and Confrontation in South America

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Denials and the Rescue Mission
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves a forced car ride, an encounter with 'Mama', the emergence of El Tigre, and the initiation of the rescue plan for Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Whispers of El Tigre and Forced Car Entry
Arrival, Mama's Reveal, and Rosita's Rescue
Stage Dollar Diversion and El Tigre's Reveal
Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre
News of Rosita and the Rescue Plan
The Determined Ride to Rescue Rosita

sub_scenes.title: Hotel and Citadel Battles and Rosita's Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene contains the action-packed climax of the Rosita rescue, featuring horseback assaults, hotel infiltration, citadel escape attempts, and ultimately Rosita's successful rescue.

narrative_arcs.title: Machine Gun Threat and Protective Stand

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in the Jungle: Moral Dilemmas and Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers on Devil Dog Dolan's jungle mission, his capture, moral compromises, and eventual fight against native warriors, exploring themes of duty, sacrifice, and justification.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Ambush and Capture
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Dolan's jungle combat, military reporting, and the revelation of a disobeyed order and a bargain, culminating in Dolan's jungle arrival and ambush.

sub_scenes.title: Captivity, Torture, and Moral Justification
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dolan's captivity, the torture of another captive, and Dolan's internal justification for his actions, including a flashback to a grim event involving Sam.

narrative_arcs.title: Brought Before Grauer and Suspicious Object
Orders, Forced Writing, and Torture Threat
Flashback: Sam Burning and Dolan's Grim Justification
Grauer's Indifference and Orders Amidst Burning Huts
Dolan's Justification for Burning and Vengeful Declaration

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Fight and Alliance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Dolan's jungle ambush, the death of the native chief, and the unexpected alliance formed between Dolan and the natives.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Dilemma and Dolan's Discipline
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the Captain's moral dilemma, a fight involving his son Sam, and Dolan's disciplinary spanking, highlighting themes of duty and service.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins and the Murder of Robert Burgess
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Dan and Diane (the Twinkle Twins) as they investigate the murder of banker Robert Burgess, uncovering a complex web of connections involving Farnacci and a desperate father's sacrifice.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to the Murder Case
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Twinkle Twins and their assignment to investigate the murder of Robert Burgess, setting up the initial mystery and suspects.

narrative_arcs.title: City Street Confrontation with Twinkle Twins
Police Station Inquiry about Guy Reilly
Hospital Reception and Inquiry about Miss Reilly
Persuasion and Access to Miss Reilly
Meeting Miss Reilly - The Sick Little Girl

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Blood Transfusion Crisis
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Dan and Diane's visit to Miss Reilly in the hospital, the revelation of her blood disease and the urgent need for a rare blood type, leading to Farnacci's involvement.

narrative_arcs.title: Sympathy for Miss Reilly and Blood Type Discussion
Candy Store and Phone Call to Elijah
Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store
Elijah's Instructions: Connect Farnacci, Banker, Haskel, and Brown
Radio Broadcast about Farnacci's Gang and Banker Threat
Decision to Look for Tom Reilly in Irish Section

sub_scenes.title: Unraveling Tom Reilly's Sacrifice and the Ambush
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features the search for Tom Reilly in the Irish section, Mrs. Murphy's revelation about Tom's sacrifice, and the sudden violent ambush outside Mrs. Murphy's house.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Tom Reilly in the Irish Section
Mrs. Murphy's Revelation: Tom Reilly's Sacrifice
Taxi Ambush and Dan as Witness

sub_scenes.title: Street Chase, Capture, and Community Heroism
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene showcases Dan's pursuit of the shooters, the Irish neighborhood's intervention, the ensuing street brawl, and the arrival of the police to apprehend the criminals.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Crisis and Community Blood Drive
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene deals with the aftermath of the ambush, the transport of the injured to the hospital, the dire news about Tom Reilly's condition, and the community's response to the blood donation appeal.

narrative_arcs.title: Blood Type Mismatch and Community Appeal
Blood Type Match and Transfusion Preparation

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Celebration
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the murder mystery with the public outcry against Farnacci, police action leading to his impending arrest, and a celebratory birthday party for Lassie Reilly, marking a happy resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning Police Intervention and Media Coverage
Accusation and Denial Regarding Blood Donation
Confirmation of Farnacci's Gang Affiliation and Impending Arrest
Celebration of Recovery and Future Adventures
